SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_gps_snapshoot (device_id, alarm_status, vehicle_status, longitude, latitude, height, speed, direction, time, milestone, oil, speed2, signal_status, io_status, analog, wiff, satellite_num, create_time, vendor) values (#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{direction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{milestone,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{oil,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ioStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{analog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wiff,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{satelliteNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vendor,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_gps_snapshoot set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_status = #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_status = #{vehicleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, milestone = #{milestone,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oil = #{oil,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, speed2 = #{speed2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, signal_status = #{signalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, io_status = #{ioStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, analog = #{analog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wiff = #{wiff,jdbcType=INTEGER}, satellite_num = #{satelliteNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vendor = #{vendor,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, device_id, alarm_status, vehicle_status, longitude, latitude, height, speed, direction, time, milestone, oil, speed2, signal_status, io_status, analog, wiff, satellite_num, create_time, vendor from t_gps_snapshoot where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, device_id, alarm_status, vehicle_status, longitude, latitude, height, speed, direction, time, milestone, oil, speed2, signal_status, io_status, analog, wiff, satellite_num, create_time, vendor from t_gps_snapshoot

select id, device_id, alarm_status, vehicle_status, longitude, latitude, height, speed, direction, time, milestone, oil, speed2, signal_status, io_status, analog, wiff, satellite_num, create_time, vendor from t_gps_snapshoot where device_id = #{deviceId}
